extendedIngredients.name: simple syrup
extendedIngredients.originalString: A beautiful and simple summer treat, that I guarantee you will make over and over again.

extendedIngredients.name: hey friends
extendedIngredients.originalString: Hey friends, welcome back to Foodie Friday!

recipes.title: Blueberry Pie Pinwheels

winePairing.pairingText: Pie works really well with Lambrusco Dolce, Late Harvest Riesling, and Vin Santo. These wines are all sweet, which is important since wine should usually be sweeter than the food you're pairing with it. The Snake River Late Harvest Riesling with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 16 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Snake River Late Harvest Riesling
productMatches.description: Made from the grapes left to hang on the vine in our estate Arena Valley Vineyard, Late Harvest Riesling is our original dessert wine. Our 2011 has a limeade nose with a hint of minerals and a honey finish. Enjoy this wine with fruit based desserts or as a refreshing aperitif.

recipes.instructions: Slice dough 1  - 2 inch slices and place on baking sheet.Make topping: add all of the ingredients together in a small mixing bowl. Then using your finger, pastry blender or fork mix all of the ingredients together, crumbling the butter and breaking into small pieces. Once the mixture looks like coarse crumbs sprinkle the top of each pinwheel. Once you have added all of the topping place in oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until crust is a light golden brown.

steps.step: Slice dough 1  - 2 inch slices and place on baking sheet.Make topping: add all of the ingredients together in a small mixing bowl. Once the mixture looks like coarse crumbs sprinkle the top of each pinwheel. Once you have added all of the topping place in oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until crust is a light golden brown.
